<h1>Project 8: House Price Predictor ￿ YOUR FIRST ML PROJECT </h1>
Tech: Scikit-learn, Pandas, Matplotlib <br>
What You Build:<br> Load house price dataset, split into train/test, train linear regression model, make predictions, calculate accuracy (R² score), plot predictions vs actual prices.<br>
Exact Steps:<br>
1. Load Kaggle house price dataset <br>
2. Choose features (size, bedrooms, bathrooms, age) <br>
3. Split data: 80% train, 20% test <br>
4. Train Linear Regression model <br>
5. Make predictions on test set V
6. Calculate R² score (how well model fits) <br>
7. Calculate Mean Absolute Error (MAE)<br>
8. Plot: predicted prices vs actual prices <br>
9. Save trained model to file<br>
Learning Goals:<br> - Machine learning workflow - Train/test split importance - Linear regression concept - Model evaluation metrics - Working with scikit learn<br>
Real-World Use: Real estate pricing, property valuation systems, market
analysis<br>
